posts.post_content: Judging how Basic Snow Lands are the same as Basic Lands except they also provide snow mana, and this can also find things like [Frost Marsh](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Frost Marsh) and [Scrying Sheets](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scrying Sheets), I'm gonna go out on a limb here and say this is strictly better than [Rampant Growth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rampant Growth).
